name: A2A Protocol
description: Agent-to-Agent protocol for P2P communication between AI agents

enabled.label: Enable A2A Protocol
enabled.help: Enable the A2A endpoint for agent-to-agent communication

port.label: A2A Port
port.help: Port for the A2A HTTP server (use 0 for same as gateway)

authToken.label: Authentication Token
authToken.help: Bearer token for authenticating A2A requests

agentName.label: Agent Name
agentName.help: Name displayed in the A2A AgentCard

agentDescription.label: Agent Description
agentDescription.help: Description displayed in the A2A AgentCard

skills.label: Skills
skills.help: List of skills exposed via A2A

port.description: Port for A2A server (0 = same as gateway)
